headline.main: BRITON CALLS ON U.S. FOR SPEED IN OUTPUT; Morrison Says Only Mightiest Effort Can Save Us From Trials

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 8 -- Although Britain is nearing peak production, Herbert Morrison, Home Secretary, told the people of the United States in a broadcast to America tonight that only their mightiest effort would save them.
abstract: Brit Sec H Morrison broadcasts speed plea
snippet: LONDON, Oct. 8 -- Although Britain is nearing peak production, Herbert Morrison, Home Secretary, told the people of the United States in a broadcast to America tonight that only their mightiest effort would save them....

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
